title: The Midnight Manor Mystery
description: A wealthy businessman is found dead in his study. Was it murder or suicide? Question suspects, examine evidence, and uncover the truth.

suspects.name: Victoria Blackwood
suspects.bio: The elegant but troubled wife of the deceased. Married for 15 years.

suspects.name: Marcus Sterling
suspects.bio: Long-time business partner and friend. Recently had disagreements about company direction.

suspects.name: James Hartford
suspects.bio: The loyal butler who has served the family for 20 years. Found the body.

locations.name: The Study
locations.description: The crime scene where the body was discovered.

records.name: Financial Records
records.description: Recent bank statements and business transactions.
